Reviews.Title: Preferred my old phone but it is no longer available
Reviews.Author: C. Cheney
Reviews.Content: Main complaint is that it locks all the time. I might pause when using the phone for any number of reasons and it locks. Perhaps it is because my old phone slid open and was ready to use that this bothers me. I also find the keys a tad small even for my small hands. Other than minor irritations the phone works fine.

Reviews.Title: Good phone, works well
Reviews.Author: AHepburn
Reviews.Content: I had this phone (bought through AT&T;) and wanted to get my husband one as it's so easy to text with. Works well. Would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Jen T
Reviews.Content: I chose this phone because of the ease of texting.  Works great for the money, and completely satisfied with the phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Beverly C.
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. But the button are to small. I miss this phone. If the button where bigger. Great.

Reviews.Title: Needed
Reviews.Author: Braydon Bell
Reviews.Content: I needed a back up, not high fangled but enough to get the job done. No complaints about the phone it does the job.

Reviews.Title: Decent Phone
Reviews.Author: Candace B. Walden "Candybrie"
Reviews.Content: I broke my last one of these by kneeling on it, so I needed just the phone. I bought this one and it came pretty nice. Its just the phone though, so if you need the charger (its a really weird one) you need to get it elsewhere. I'm pretty sure this phone came with a screen protector already installed, which was really neat.The most frustrating thing about this phone is there is no headphone jack, only their ridiculous proprietary charger plug. You can get headphones for it, but they'll only ever work for that phone, they're usually cheap crap, and you can't charge it while listening to music.

Reviews.Title: AC Adapter not working
Reviews.Author: Diane Van Slyke
Reviews.Content: This is everything as described.  Does not come with car adapter or instruction manual, which I found online.  Packaged well and received on time. Just tried to charge the phone with the included charger (AC/DC Adapter), and it won't charge....have to wiggle the cord around at the otherside of the usb plug, so it's not the phone, it's the adapter.  AT&T; no longer carries this adapter, and Radio Shack also does not have it.......don't know what I'm going to do!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: dk
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone before Christmas for myself. Order came delivered as expected. I got this phone because of theqwerty key board. Very nice phone, easy texting! I ordered the refurbished for a price of only $29.99. It has the AT@T logo and I have T-Mobile, but no big deal. Phone looks like knew. Refurbished usually means they change out the outer casing which does look like it is brand new. It came with battery, and charger. I put in my sim and memory card and I was off and running.One thing with AT&T; is that they have a lot of their own programs loaded on the phone that can't be used or deleted unless you have their data plan. That being said, there are things you can't use. The quick link to browser on the menu you can't use, also the email center on menu you can't use. So, to setup email to push to phone you can't. However, the work around I used was using Internet email. I have gmail and aol that I setup as a bookmark, and can go right there without signing in each time. All you do is click the box on the email site to "keep me logged in" and it works fine.Good sound quality on phone. Just love it!

Reviews.Title: multi funcional
Reviews.Author: edwin
Reviews.Content: Es un aparato total mente funcional siempre y cuando tenga Internet podrás disfrutar de sus diversos correo electrónico. contiene gps funcional cámara de 1.3mp y muy buena imagen nítida. para el precio que tienes es un super telf.

Reviews.Title: finding keys
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Kassulke
Reviews.Content: Needed a method for finding lost keys.  My son has a habit of that.  The device actually worked and is easy to program

Reviews.Title: messaging doesnt work
Reviews.Author: Gregory Longo
Reviews.Content: this phone doesnt work if uu want to send messages. it says initalizing messages. definatly not worth the money i had to return mine
